pullRequest.title: Enable lower_snake_case validation of SQL and squash migrations

Squash SQL migrations files together
Enable validation to disallow camel casing in SQL migrations
Fix camelCased names in SQL migration file

commit.message:
Enable lower_snake_case validation of SQL and squash migrations

1. Squash SQL migrations files together
2. Enable validation to disallow camel casing in SQL migrations
3. Fix camelCased names in SQL migration file

nodes.bodyText: Not sure about that, but don't we usually use TripleA as default way to write it?
